categories: Category:Creatures of the Bright Jewel sector

nodes.text: Hesten were creatures with large ears, a long tail, four arms and two legs and were seen on the planet Balnab. They were hunted by the Balnab.
Some were pets of the slaver Darts D'Nar.

Hesten first appeared in the episode "Nomad Droids," the sixth episode of fourth season of The Clone Wars television series. Though going unnamed in the episode, they were identified as hesten in the episode guide trivia gallery.
